issue.description: There is no such type single_datum.
This rule has been removed from express, but it looks like it should exist.
This rule has been removed from express, but it looks like it should exist.

comment.description:
Agree. The rule shall exist. The rule states that there shall be exactly one material assigned to the default_via_definition. It inherits the property from the supertype that it shall be classified as conductive so this rule doesn't need to say that.
It may be useful to use a DERIVEd attribute deposition_material here.

issue.description: Why did this WR was removed: All Layer_connection_points specified shall be on the same Design_layer_stratum?

comment.description: where rule wr2 added; update arm.xml and descriptions.xml

issue.description: The result of this WR is always TRUE.

comment.description: where rule rewritten. now states that if laminate_component participates in a padstack occurrence then the assembly_component_relationship shall be the Padstack_occurrence_sub_assembly_relationship that relates it to the padstack_occurrence. xml and descriptions need to be updated.

issue.description: The result of this WR is always TRUE.

comment.description: where rule rewritten. now states that if laminate_component participates in a footprint occurrence then the assembly_component_relationship shall be the Footprint_occurrence_sub_assembly_relationship that relates it to the footprint_occurrence. xml and descriptions need to be updated.

issue.description: This WR allows laminate_component to be assembled by all possible ways.
This rule has been removed from express, but it looks like it should exist.

comment.description:
Agree. The rule shall exist. The rule states that there may be no more than one material assigned to the Passage_technology and that if a material is assigned, then that material shall have a conductivity classification
It may be useful to use a DERIVEd attribute deposition_material here.

description.p: material attribute migrated to Passage_technology so following proposed rules are needed:
WR2: Each passage that is plated shall have deposition_material provided.
WR3: Each passage that has maximum_as_finished_deposition_thickness provided shall have deposition_material provided.
WR4: Each passage that has minimum_as_finished_deposition_thickness provided shall have deposition_material provided.
WR5: If plated_passage has a value of TRUE Passage_technology shall reference Material_conductivity_classification that equals "conductive".

comment.description: arm express updated, arm.xml and descriptions.xml need to be updated per previous comment

issue.description: Had to add a name attribute back in, and unique rule back in. need to have xml and descriptions updated. mapping affected
